name: IL-2 Sturmovik: Battle of Stalingrad Deluxe Edition
description:
Aimed at history fans, this bundle includes the base game with its Stalingrad career mode, two additional collector's aircraft, and three historical, hand-crafted campaigns that build upon each other to create the 45-scenario saga of the Stalingrad front - Blazing Steppe (11th IAP pilot on Yak-1 series 69 in August and September 1942), Fortress on the Volga (I./JG 52 Staffel commander on Bf 109 G-2 in September and October), and Ice Ring (505th ShAP pilot on IL-2 mod. 1942 in November and December).

In total, this bundle contains 18 player-controlled aircraft, a pilot career mode, individual scenario missions, and a mission generator on the large map of the Stalingrad region as it was in 1942 and three historical campaigns.

name: Total Chaos
description:
Total Chaos is a relentless survival horror experience from Trigger Happy Interactive (creator of Turbo Overkill) and Apogee Entertainment. Washed ashore on Fort Oasis, a long-abandoned mining colony swallowed by decay, players must scavenge for supplies, craft makeshift weapons, and navigate a world where hallucinations warp reality and unspeakable horrors lurk in the shadows.

With dynamic AI-driven enemies, a Madness system that distorts perception, and a brutal fight for survival, Total Chaos pushes the boundaries of psychological horror. Every bullet counts, every wound matters, and your own mind may be your worst enemy.

Prepare to descend into madness—Total Chaos launches in 2025 on PC via Steam, with an optional VR mode for those brave enough to step inside the nightmare.

name: Card TD
description: CardTD is a hybrid tower defense and a deck-building game. Packaged with a ton of user freedom in playstyles with a progression system that lets you play at your own pace. Defend your base from waves of toybox like enemies by playing cards to gain resources and towers to defend yourself!

name: Beat the Fed
description: Run the Federal Reserve in this macroeconomics time-traveling simulation game. Apply monetary and fiscal policies and monitor and assess the impact on unemployment, inflation, and other key economic metrics. Can you Beat the Fed?

name: Hoyo
description: The world's fate lays on Hoyo's hands. In this dark adventure your hero instinct will guide you through the unknown, but rescuing survivors, piloting a ship and taking action to destroy invaders will not come easy.

name: Project Rebearth
description: The game is set in a post-apocalyptic utopia where you rebuild society after a global collapse. A massive online multiplayer where everyone plays on an exact replica of planet earth. Grow your town, trade with other players, face challenges and discover the rich history of the planet.

name: A Dungeon Is You
description: You died and got reincarnated as a dungeon core! Grow your dungeon, summon minions to defend you and conquer the world. A Dungeon Is You is a modern incremental dungeon management game. With a sprinkle of tower defense and rpg.

name: Pixel Tennis
description: Pixel Tennis is a captivating online multiplayer tennis game crafted with love by a single indie developer. Dive into the world of fast-paced arcade style tennis, where every match is a thrilling rally. Create and customize your own character and team up with a friend or play solo against the world.

name: CatboyZoom
description: Become a catboy and zoom through the many handcrafted worlds in this FPS Platforming Speedrunner! Master your control over the source-inspired movement system and leave your best times for others to challenge!

name: Drewdler
description: Drewdler is a puzzle platformer where you launch Drew in their orb of armor. Use the unique ability to draw lines and navigate through levels, collect gravity crystals and get back to the portal. Piece levels back together, and save the world!

name: Bruno: Lost In Nightmares
description: A Metroidvania game Where the player will have to face their worst nightmares With a sword, bow and arrow, and some secret powers.

name: Gun Runners
description: Blast your way through ever increasing hordes of space bandits and alien creatures in this action roguelite. Level up your character and obtain powerful upgrade items with a variety of effects. Procedurally generated enemy waves and item choices prevent any two runs from playing out the same way.

name: Word Turtle Island
description: Word Turtle Island is a nature dungeon action shooter where you use words as weapons to rescue books and readers in danger from creatures destroying the most powerful library in the galaxy. After battle, help the books and readers get where they need to be in your book sanctuary home base.

name: Heraean Games
description: This game may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages or for viewing in the workplace: general adult content. Contains content that is not suitable for all ages, sexual themes.

name: Riser of Babel
description: Avoid all obstacles and get high as you can! Riser of Babel is endless 2d jump platform puzzle game. Stack different style blocks for your character and run for higher score! Master stacking tower and challenge for avoid falling debris and critical lighting!

name: Back Fire
description: Back Fire is a full motion video gunfight action adventure game. In the game, players need to make their own choices, which will affect the progression of the plot. The final endings of the story will be different, and the secret hidden in the world of “Back Fire” will be revealed.

name: Popping Bubble
description: This game combines Tetris-style gameplay with a unique twist. Balls of various colors fall from the top, and you connect same-colored balls to touch both walls, earning points. Realistic physics add unpredictability. Chain reactions increase scores tenfold, encouraging strategic play.

name: Under Canopies
description: Under Canopies is a serene exploration and survival experience. Set your own pace as you immerse yourself in activities like building and decorating your cabin, animal husbandry, crafting delicious meals, and uncovering the hidden secrets and valuable resources scattered throughout nature.

name: Farkas: the Last Redhaft
description: As the last survivor of the dojo, the responsibility is on you. Parkour your way through the most dangerous mines. Slash the enemies in the forest and master the art of the sword.

name: Shadows of Betrayal
description: Dive into Shadows of Betrayal, a horror/thriller visual novel about recent high school graduates, who head to a remote cabin for a celebration of sorts. Navigate friendships, delve into (optional) romance, and brace for suspenseful twists. Can you survive the unexpected, and what will it cost you?

name: Zenatria
description: It's time to answer the call, go into battle against the forces of Yurmim to defend the town from the onslaught of enemies.

name: Breaking Bricks
description: Brick game space themed.

name: Dead Don't Die
description: Dead Don't Die is a top-down action shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Every encounter is high-stakes; one stray bullet or sneaky knife attacker is all it takes to end your run ... not to mention the zombies that grab hold and won't let go. So use cover, be accurate, and be quick or be dead.

name: Mayonaka 10 Chome
description: Currently, in the town of Mayonaka, abnormal phenomena and terrifying apparitions have been witnessed. If you encounter them, never approach,Please turn left at this road. If there are no abnormalities, please turn right. Will you be able to safely navigate through the eternal road of terror?

name: Delic
description: Explore the countryside of Brazil in this third person survival horror game. Fight, survive, and discover that sometimes good intentions can lead to devastating results.

name: Steal Deal
description: Embark on a 2D shooting adventure alone or with friends! Navigate randomly generated levels, enhance your character, and strive to attain the Divine Deal in this action-packed game!

name: Ponder
description: A fishing simulation game set in a lush fantasy world.

name: Undercroft
description: Under the old forgotten church lies a sprawling crypt, filled with lost histories and abandoned secrets. Search through the forgotten catacombs and uncover the mystery behind it's creation. Maybe you can find out how to save yourself along the way.

name: Radical Race
description: And endless scrolling hover bike escape race (on Planet Mars).

name: Neverdaunt:8Bit
description:
Neverdaunt:8Bit (N8) was an online massively multiplayer virtual sandbox created by Robot Loves Kitty. In the game, players would explore a "dreamlike world of floating islands and fallen stars where nearly anything can happen." Players could fight, build, socialize, and shop. The game also included a visual programming language called Tronics that allowed players to program devices within the game.
N8's servers were shut down in May 2012.

name: DarkStar One: Nintendo Switch Edition
description:
Commander, welcome aboard the DarkStar One – Nintendo Switch Edition to be released on June 20, 2024

Breach the final frontier and explore the vast expanse of this retro space opera.

name: Saihate Station
description: A love and hate bromance exploration horror ADV that depicts the codependency and perverted love between two men.

name: Grim Dungeon
description:
Grim Dungeon is a vertical slice of a JRPG project, made with Godot.
Crawl through the dungeon and defeat the final boss by using your abilities intelligently.

name: Touhou Flower Fight
description:
Create Your Own Party!

Combine numerous characters and cards to create your own party.
You can freely mix and match them to create the optimal team,
and the tactics and play style of your party will be determined by your choices.

name: Witch's Doll
description: Witch's Doll is a first-person psychological horror game with realistic graphics. Beware, something is lurking in the dark. Get ready for intense jumpscares.

name: Los Pingheros
description: Duck, dodge and toss. Los Pingheros is a multiplayer brawler for up to 8 players online or local. Join hectic battles in various modes and strive to become the ultimate Pinghero in Mexico by snowing your opponents out of the arena.

name: Zelda 64: Recompiled - Ocarina of Time

Every girl is born a fashion designer. YoYa: Dress Up Princess arouses in them the talent for creating beauty to magnify their charm.

Have you ever dreamt of cosplaying as an anime magic princess? Anime Princess: Cosplay ASMR will make your dreams come true!

description: This set includes the following DLC: Van's Swimsuit, Agnès' Swimsuit, Feri's Swimsuit, Aaron's Swimsuit, Risette's Swimsuit, Quatre's Swimsuit, Judith's Swimsuit, Bergard's Swimsuit and École de Aramis Uniform Set.

name: Above
description: ABOVE is a challenging climbing game set in a mysterious world. Reach, jump and grab on to rocks and moving objects as you pave your way through the vertical terrain. Experience a mysterious and intriguing world with gameplay that will challenge both your skills and endurance.

name: Abandoned Moons
description: Embark with your friends to explore abandoned moons in search of resources and valuable loot in a cooperative first-person horror experience. Level up and assemble a complete arsenal of tools, gadgets, and helper robots to accomplish the mission.

name: Turn Based Boxing
description: In this turn-based (optional auto-battler) simulation game, you'll recruit, train, and manage a roster of boxing champions as you strive to build the ultimate fighting dynasty.

name: Weekend in Waimanalo
description: Weekend in Waimanalo is a romantic comedy yuri visual novel and dating sim. This is a game about love, respect, friendship, self-exploration, and mental health. Explore this hidden side of Oahu, get to know interesting characters, and see how your decisions affect where Rachel ends up and with who!

name: The Nightmare House
description: Escape from the nightmare mansion alive. In the protagonist's workplace, rumors of a nightmare are spreading. A terrifying dream where one is chased by something horrifying, and if caught, never wakes up again. Navigate through the mansion of horrors, fleeing from monsters, and attempt to escape.

name: Heart of Shadows
description: This is a simple 2D role-playing game. Explore different levels, defeat monsters, collect equipment and skills, and become more powerful.

name: The Strong High School
description: The Strong High School is said to be attended only by strong characters. Before you know it, "you" will be enrolling in THE STRONG HIGH SCHOOL. ---

name: Eqqo
description: Inspired by ancient Ethiopian legends, Eqqo is a poetic narrative puzzle game, an initiatory adventure, and a love song to nature.

name: Fallopian Frenzy! Come Again?
description: Ten years ago (2014) I made my first game. This is that game. Mostly intact. I'm sorry.

name: FlowerRock
description: FlowerRock is a 2D platformer for players who love intense boss fights and an mysterious story. Something happened to this world, powerful enemies and secrets litter the landscape. Unlock upgrades for your laser to blast stronger enemies and unravel the story of what happened to this forsaken world.

name: I Commissioned Some Bunnies 6
description: I paid artists to hide bunnies and carrots in 15 artworks. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted Demo
description: The PlayStation 2 demo disc for Need for Speed: Most Wanted features 3 unique events that are not found in the main game, including a race against Rog, Blacklist rival #16.

name: Devices Tycoon
description: Devices Tycoon is a unique business simulator that will make you feel like the owner of a company that creates your own devices! In the game you can create your own smartphones, tablets, laptops, smart watches, headphones, operating systems and even your own processors!

name: A Surgery Beyond The Heart
description: This is a pix word puzzle adventure game based on RPGMaker.With serval different choice,you will get total different endings. You need to play the Germany returned genius doctor Shen Yi to find the dark side of the hospital.

name: Deadlands Duel: Time Rift Rumble
description: Deadlands Duel is a wave-based zombie defense shooter that takes place throughout all of history via time travel. You will fight hoards of zombies with various weapons and armaments. Choose one of four class types to specialize your gameplay to fit your desired role in this team-play focused arena.

name: Rail Maze 2
description: Navigate 100+ original puzzles, build railroads, and outsmart PIRATE foes on rails. Create your levels with the Level Editor and solve limitless challenges created by other players. Unleash creativity and conquer the rails in this thrilling puzzle adventure!

name: Lunarium
description: Lunarium is an atmospheric fantasy A-RPG. Play as Ave, a light-armored knight, who teams up with Lune, a mysterious Starfarer. Together, they journey to save a dying world, engaging in challenging battles to retrieve the lost glow of the stars and forsaken memories, unveiling cosmic secrets.

name: Arishihi no Watashi-tachi he
description: 'Arishihi no watashitachi e' is a "reversed pastoral adventure" set in a world where only lush nature and remnants of civilization remain. In this world, a boy who has lost his memory and a girl dreaming of adulthood weave their future together.

name: Sodden
description: The story of survival in a closed scientific town. There are unexplained anomalies around every corner. There are terrifying monsters behind every door. Survive while a dark otherworldly something penetrates the world, absorbing everything around.

name: Natures Ascendancy
description: Natures Ascendancy" is an exhilarating open-world survival game where players explore a mysterious alien planet, uncover ancient secrets, and survive its treacherous environments. With stunning visuals and immersive gameplay mechanics, embark on an unforgettable journey of discovery and survival.

name: Battle Simulator
description: You can use the combat simulator to simulate the battle pace under three damage calculation formulas (addition, division, multiplication), and in the settings, you can choose to restart after the battle ends to calculate win rates.

name: Knowledge Domination
description: Knowledge Domination is a multiplayer knowledge and strategy game. Players attempt to conquer each other's territories by answering questions correctly. Gain special powers by rolling dice and catch your opponents off guard . If you lose your capital ️, you lose the game.

name: Star Voyage: Treasure Hunting
description: This is an independent game that has been developed by two people in our studio for many years. Thank you to everyone who has supported our product.At present, the game is still a beta version, if you encounter bugs and other problems, please contact us, you will get a red diamond reward.

name: Round My Corners
description: Round My Corners transforms your desktop with smooth, rounded edges, seamlessly integrated for a sleek look. Customize effortlessly, enjoy low resource consumption, and elevate your digital experience. Join the Round Corner Cult and embrace the future of desktop aesthetics today!

name: ScarQuest
description: Raise armies to dominate, seize, and reign over the planet as its ruler.

name: Legacy of Sin: Ill-Boding
description: The world as we knew it no longer exists. Join the few remaining survivors, lead them, and build your city, feed your people and organize your defenses to survive the hordes of enemies attacking your kingdom, mankind's last kingdom, our hope. Can you turn a small village into a great realm?

name: Tornado Emergency
description: A storm chasing simulation/strategy based game that immerses players in the thrill of tracking and intercepting tornadoes.

name: Gun Shop 3
description: Do you like guns? Many people sure do! Gun Shop 3 is a real-time storefront simulator with a sprinkling of first person shooter mechanics on top. Choose your location, design your store, stock the shelves, and then flip that sign to “open for business”! The demand is there. Can you supply it?

name: Escape from the Cannibal Family
description: Never get caught! Jack up the doll's vision! Feel their presence!

name: Fern Light
description: Play as Wanda, a 17-year-old on a quest to uncover a Polish legend's secrets. Solve puzzles, explore captivating landscapes, and dive into a richly hand-drawn world of mystery and magic. Ready for an unforgettable adventure?

name: Dimachaerus
description: Dimachaerus is a Hack'n Slash game in which you have to face hordes of enemies using weapons found in the scenario, use different weapons and make different combos to defeat the zombies that have dominated the kingdom, but be careful too you're fragile like an undead.

name: The Spewnicorn
description: Build the ultimate deck of cards and wield it to defeat the Gatekeepers! A cute and colorful roguelike full of fantastical whimsy!

name: Homeworld: Vast Reaches
description: Immerse yourself in a bold new story in the beloved Homeworld saga that brings real-time strategic space battles to VR. Your fleet is at your fingertips in this all-new game where you can execute strategic attacks on your enemies from any direction or angle.

name: Owe Money Pay Money
description: Big Chief embarks on a quest for justice & cold hard cash in this retro brawler. Packed with eye-popping pixel art, 8-bit bangers, & a Singaporean twist, it’s as bizarre as beat ‘em ups get. Welcome to Owe Money Pay Money (O$P$)!

name: Kenoma: Action Without Action
description: Answer the question of mortality in this sidescroller inspired by point-and-click adventures of old. Wander the depths of a world split in two. Confer with gods, locals, and other travelers. Solve problems through intuition and a collection of odd trinkets. Choose: death, or eternal life?

name: Adorable Dog: Gnomeageddon
description: The Gnome Legion has attacked! Save your friends, defend the village and bring the fight to the gnomes! Travel to unique worlds and recruit your animal buddies to help destroy those gnome once and for all!

name: Machine Challenger
description: Multiplayer Vehicle Combat game. Set in chaotic 2041, you are one of a few, who can experience “The Program”. All Around Reality Show, which takes place in the Machine Challenger arena.

name: Better With A Friend
description: Better With A Friend is a collection of hand drawn mini-games that you can only play with somebody else on a Steam Deck.

name: StressRoom
description: With Stress Room VR, boring days are a thing of the past! Put on your VR goggles, grab a baseball bat, and smash everything in the room to relieve stress! Your room becomes an explosion arena, push your limits, and unwind!

name: Disaster Plan Z
description: Disaster Plan Z is a hardcore single-player shooting survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. Players need to utilize various weapons along with their unique skills, construct different buildings, and continuously upgrade to resist the invasion of countless zombies and mutant creatures.

name: Vitriol
description: Physics based VR movement shooter MARCH FOR YOUR GOD

name: Gunpowder Massacre
description: Gunpowder Massacre is a 2D action shooter with Rogue-Lite elements set in a steampunk atmosphere. Play as one of the only survivors after the MP-2000 virus changed the world. Survive the hordes of enemies, defeat as many as you can, and showcase your skills to put your name in the Hall of Fame!

name: Fantastic Frolic
description: Embark on a whimsical quest to save the world in Fantastic Frolic. Play as Lil' J, Esther or Gorf and use your unique abilities to defeat monsters and uncover the truth behind the volcanic explosion prophecy. Explore a vibrant world, gather resources, and level up in this delightful adventure.

name: Trench Tales
description: A story-driven third-person action game set in a dark, alternative world between WWI and WWII. Harness unique powers, customize your arsenal, and navigate haunting Gothic landscapes. Battle fallen soldiers as you uncover the mysteries of this realm.

name: Strange Tales of Tei-Shan
description: Strange Tales of Tieshan is a text adventure inspired by Chinese records of anomalies. As a traveler in a dark land of monsters, you make elixirs, choose paths, and negotiate with supernatural beings to survive and collect bizarre stories to appease a possessed book and escape.

name: Death Education
description: Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of an old abandoned Soviet school and find out what's going on inside its walls from the first person in the new psychological horror Death Education. But be careful, something is already watching you.

name: Warlanes
description: Experience the fusion of WWII action and strategic MOBA-style gameloop. Lead your troops in third-person shooter battles, guide them down their lanes, and siege the enemy base in a war-torn landscape.

name: I Think
description: One day, the programmer came up with an idea. If he could get AI to learn his diary, he could create himself in the electronic world.

name: Cat Cafe Simulator
description: Start your new life as the owner of a charming but rundown Cat Cafe. Your mission? To clean, renovate, and bring warmth to a place where both humans and cats can find comfort in the cozy ambiance of your making.

name: Lil' Airport
description: Lil' Airport is a an idle airport management game. Build and manage your own airport directly on your desktop. Expand your airport from a small airstrip to a bustling travel hub. Schedule flights, delight passengers with amenities, face emergencies - or just watch the planes go by.

name: Professor Doctor Jetpack
description: Professor Doctor Jetpack is a physics based lunar lander game, in which you embark on a dangerous journey to ... control your jetpack. Also to save the world, of course.

name: Whispers of The Abyss
description: Whispers of The Abyss is a horror game set on an old, abandoned oil rig owned by a ruthless corporation, Mangrove Dynamics. Your task is to survive. Just survive. And remember one thing: machines and fluid are your best allies.

name: BackRooms: Lost
description: Backrooms: Lost supports multiplayer, allowing 1 to 4 players to navigate mysterious environments, evading lethal entities while striving to escape. All future content updates, like new levels and game modes, will remain complimentary. The multiplayer mode will launch alongside the initial release.

name: Search and Rescue: Snowman From Outer Space
description: SNOWMAN from OUTER SPACE!Snowman from Outer Space appeared in nearby mountains!Save yourself or Fight them if You dare!

name: Endura
description: Follow the journey of ex-convict, Jack Jr as he traverse the broken realm of Yagra to finish vital deliveries by utilizing grappling mechanics akin to Spiderman but with guns and swords, and hunting down titans reminisce to Monster Hunter.

name: RadioWave
description: Welcome to RadioWorld! An amazing attraction filled with robotics with the latest artificial intelligence and robust systems put in place for all ages to come and enjoy... or at least that's what RadioWorld was before the incident. RadioWave is always watching. Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Chest
description: Afternoon, sunshine, pool, sound of flowing water, and... a dream? This is 'Chest'.

name: Realms of Alterra
description: Explore Realms of Alterra, an AI-Sandbox RPG fusing GPT-based AI & stunning procedural worlds. Carve your path, form bonds, and reveal new realms in this Nordic adventure. Witness revolutionary AI, intricate world-building, and emergent gameplay in this constantly evolving, immersive journey.

name: Endless Casual Drive
description: This is an immersive leisure solo journey. All you have to do is focus on driving and enjoy driving. Slowly gain peace and return to yourself in the white noise brought by the engine and the environment.

name: SpinSweep
description: Control a spinning cleaner and clean up garbages. With just movement controls, cleaning tools will combine one after another, bringing surprises and exhilaration. Let's use unique cleaning tools on various stages to aim for high scores.

name: The Flame's Heir
description: The Kingdom is protected by the Sacred Flame, a source of power that can only be used by the Flame's Heir. This individual comes from a very long lineage of warriors that wage an eternal war against evil. Vaynard, the son of a veteran of war, is called upon a quest he could never anticipate.

name: The Last Vampire Hunter
description: As the last of a long lineage of Vampire Hunters, Beaumont Lacaster finds himself in the doorsteps of Nosferatu's Castle. By defeating him, he can rid humanity of the curse and evil of vampires. Will he be able to defeat Nosferatu?

name: ChronoClone
description: The final project for a team of high school seniors as part of their game design class, Chrono Clone is a free to play puzzle platformer with multiple levels.

name: Ironmarked
description: Ironmarked is a 1 to 3 player co-op RPG with turn-based combat, set in a medieval fantasy world inspired by Renaissance Italy. Select your band of deadly mercenaries to take on perilous quests from the local factions, just remember the most important rule… get paid!

name: Cool Go
description: a very fun fantastic game.Suitable for families to play together and spend a wonderful leisure time.you will be a magic boy,running in a fantastic world just like you comeback to your childhood.

name: All Doe's Life
description: It's a story of a small-town girl with no name. You're going on a one-person journey with a camera, find the right angle, then press the shutter. Look closely, solve the puzzles, and see each different side of her.

name: Chowdown Kitty
description: Chowdown Kitty is a cozy Match 3 game where you line up tiles of treats to feed and unlock an adorable CAT-alogue of kitty’s and dress them up in cute accessories and toys!

name: Chibi Escape
description: Long ago, you were cursed. Now you have to fight for your life by either killing hopeless Chibies, or by trying to escape the map. Loot chests, hide from the Killer, use special abilities, collaborate with others, betray them. Do everything to escape from the map alive.

name: Shadow and Darkness
description: You are a explorer of new planets. As it turned out, other planets are inhabited by shadows that are very hostile. Your task is to survive several waves to win.

name: Clean Sweep
description: A 3D, comedic, character-driven, action-RPG where everyone in Cleanland is a personification of a cleaning product! As the town janitor you'll befriend the residents of Cleanland and team up with them to fight germs!

name: Frontier Mayhem
description: A battle royale game that you never played before! Frontier Mayhem brings out all the action packed, fast paced, adrenaline ride you can hope for in a vehicle combat game!

name: Fully Dogomatic
description: An auto shooter where you create a ring of guns around you to mow down thousands of enemies! You may be an adorable corgi, but that won't stop you from designing the ultimate arsenal of fully customizable, realistic weaponry.

name: Scorching Earth
description: Scorching Earth is a 32-map vanilla megawad for Doom 2. Inspired by Hellbound by Z86, Scorching Earth features highly detailed maps that are connected to each other to give the wad continuity.

name: Silhouettes
description: You see them in your dreams, only you can solve the riddle. Immerse yourself in crime, fantasy, horror events.

name: DGGWare
description: DGGWare is a collection of meme based micro games in the vein of WarioWare. The game centers around streamer Destiny's community and covers topics from gaming, politics, philosophy, debate, art, culture and drama.

name: Eldritch Tactics: Lichtmond
description: Eldritch Tactics: Lichtmond is a turn-based strategy game based on german folklore. After her untimely demise, the Burgund queen Kriemhild and her allied troops find themselves trapped in the Anderswelt where they face an onslaught of undead creatures as well as their own steadily declining sanity.

name: Cthulhu Valley
description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot. Unfortunately, it's a cursed hellscape seeped in eldritch dread. Harvest demonic plants. Find the Cooking Book of The Dead. Sacrifice your friends. Or just grow carrots. Cthulhu can wait, he has always been waiting.

name: Rune Seeker
description: Rune Seeker is a strategy card game with a turn-based format, developed to become a tactical universe.

name: Terminal House
description: The first of terminal house series.

name: Let's Café
description: Let's Café is a cafe business simulator game with a quirky and cozy atmosphere. Manage your menu as you experiment and discover new recipes, keep your ingredient budget balanced while shopping to soup up your store, cook quickly and creatively, and serve up smiles to an array of characters!

name: Deadlock
description: Deadlock is an upcoming multiplayer game from Valve in early development.

name: It Started With Hairs
description:
A 5-10 minute visual novel about the horror of having a body.

Content Warnings for descriptions of body horror and self harm.

name: Snowtrix
description: Sin descripción

name: Subaru no Kishi
description: A fantasy SRPG.

name: SuKuBus-Mission
description: SuKuBus-Mission is an erotic role-playing game about a group of perverts trying to avoid the extermination of all lust.

name: RunieStory
description: Befriend locals, romance a girl, or even go on an adventure for money for gifts! An action RPG inspired by Stardew Valley and Rune Factory where you befriend or romance townsfolk or go explore dungeons. There is a lot of things to do such as farming, cooking and hunting! The main goal is to get married and get to know everyone the exploring dungeons.

name: Ninja Stealth 5
description: Ninja Stealth 5 is the new game in the series with a new challenge for you. Be stealth, evade from lasers, cameras, motion detectors and security guards. Collect all computers to beat the game.

name: Spot H9
description: Horror game made for Callum Upton's Game Jam.

name: Real Stories From The Grave: A Date to Keep
description: Enter the shoes of Samuel Scowl, and experience the horror of a dissolving family unit and an unkempt mind. Discover the truth through Samuel’s warped perception and piece together the reality that eludes him.

name: A Good Day to Die Hard
description: A Good Day to Die Hard is a 2D side-scrolling action game based on A Good Day to Die Hard, the fifth in the series of action movies. The game consists of several levels, playing as John or Jack McClane, and there are eight environments in total. The character needs to be guided through the environment, shooting or punching opponents and overcoming obstacles with platform based gameplay.

name: Mongol: Corpses of the Divine
description:
Enter the realm of Agrippa, where ancient gods and nightmare-inducing creatures rule supreme! This action-adventure game blends psychological horror with an intense story, which challenges players to survive in a reality distorted by malevolent forces.

In a realm where the line between reality and madness blurs, the face of the ancient god Agrippa lies atop a mountain, commanding legions of grotesque and contorted creatures. Once an artificial humanoid, now wields god-like powers and harbors a deep resentment towards his creators.

Agrippa's torment is relentless; he creates an alternate reality where every living being is a twisted reflection of Mongol, designed to break his spirit and mind.
You are the shadow of Agrippa, tasked with finding a suitable replacement for Mongol now that he is no longer of any use to him!

name: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya DLC 4 Pack: Garden of the Sun & Shining Needle Castle
description: Fourth expansion pack for Mystia Izakaya.

name: Touhou Mystia's Izakaya DLC5 Pack: Makai & Lunar Capital
description: This DLC is an expansion of Touhou Mystia's Izakaya. It adds the Lunar Capital and Makai. It also adds 6 new bond characters in addition to a myriad of other new characters, as well as an abundance of new content.

name: Bubbly's Symphony: Guardians of the Depths
description: Join Bubbly on an epic journey through the depths of the ocean in "Bubbly's Symphony: Guardians of the Depths"! As a guardian of the sea, navigate through stunning underwater worlds and combat pollution in a quest to save marine life. Share your results on social media directly from the game.

name: Push: A Duolingo Horror
description: Duolingo is the most strange HORROR game, because its at first a normal meeting for language lessons! But if you skip or miss a day, he will never let you live for long! This game is not suitable for children, for those who are easily disturbed.

name: Kawaii Evolution Clicker
description:
Become a senpai for girls in School, among whom present all anime characters, including tsundere, kuudere, yandere and many others.
Visit mansion of Onii-chan, where cute sisters and childhood friend are waiting for you.
The capital of cosplay - Akihabara. In maid cafe you will be met by a kawaii maido, gothic lolita and of course neko-chan.

name: Ghost Dance
description:
David Lynch, filmmaker, artist, and musician, has not made a video game. He certainly did not make this video game. If he were to make one, however, maybe it would be something like this complete conceptual and artistic mess.

In this game you traverse a series of horror scenes directly indebted to Lynch films and artworks cobbled together in an incoherent fever dream. In this world, 'Lynch' is struggling to rebuild his creative world / abstract psychological state and he needs your help. Only you can traverse the inane dreamscape of Lynch's creations and make some sense of the terrible things that are about to be unleashed. But beware: not all is as it seems.

name: Connie and the Essence of Chaos
description: Connie and the Essence of Chaos is a cute 2D adventure inspired by past platforming classics. JUMP and PUNCH your way through 6 distinct and colorful worlds on your quest to defeat the evil overlord Lucilate and free the island of Cuisinia from his reign of terror!

name: They Grew Lungs and Drowned
description:
Explore the wreckage.

Speak with the survivors.

The Permanent Food Source has run dry.

Time to move on.

name: Project T
description: Project T is a 1–4-person co-op PVE shooter currently in early development. Load your shotgun, ready your truck, and team up to traverse a haunting and dangerous world, facing waves of enemies from the darkest corners of The Entity’s Realm.

name: SerialWorld
description: "SerialWorld" is a comedic yet serious RPG. Whether you've played deck-building games before or not, everyone can enjoy this adventurous tale. Embark on a journey into the mysterious world to solve the city's disturbances!

name: Food Devils
description: You're the last chef in a post-apocalyptic world. Attract adventurers with monstrous food, make them sign contracts with the Food Devils and organize expeditions to collect wicked ingredients! Customize your characters, build the perfect restaurant and plan every move in this Strategy-RPG Roguelike.

name: Dwellink: War of the Nine
description: Dwellink is a dark fantasy creature collector RPG, set in a universe under siege. The Great Link opened portals connecting the Nine Worlds of Kohara, allowing ferocious Dwellers to spread chaos and destruction. It's up to you to discover the source of the cataclysm and end it once and for all!

name: Cities: Skylines Remastered - Campus
description: Back to school! In Cities: Skylines - Campus, university life abounds with new area types for any sort of student - Trade School, Liberal Arts and University. Increase the reputation of your campus by attracting students and creating Academic Works to unlock new buildings. Build five types of varsity sports arenas and nine unique faculties, employ seven new policies, earn seven new achievements and take on five new maps! Campus takes higher education to new heights with everything you need to graduate magna cum laude.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Ultimate Fishing Bundle
description: Get the Ultimate Fishing Bundle for the complete The Angler experience. Contains everything you need to set yourself up to become a master angler!

name: Duality
description: Duality is a 5-level map Doom 2 mini wad - MBF21 format where every map is a dual-themed tech base.

name: Waffle House
description: Waffle House is a set of 9 MBF21 maps by a small group of people who decided to get together and answer a simple question: "What is bro waffling about?". Maps are balanced for pistol start, target port is DSDA, and difficulties are implemented.

name: Orca
description: Orca is a very short, single map-long WAD visually influenced by rd's Eden, and otherwise inspired by the song scp2.mid.

name: Farlands Journey
description: Farlands Journey is a colorful classic adventure platformer game where you play as a little witch fighting the evil forces. Embark on an adventure to recover the stolen heart of your Magical Academy. Discover various magic spells and hats with unique effects. Defeat monsters and their bosses. Solve puzzles by combining platforming skills and magical spells. Collect gems and spend them on upgrades in Magical Academy.

name: Cathedral
description: A long map that makes use of Tango's Supercharge mod.

name: Sector Alpha
description: A boom compatible map from Async Unicorn.

name: Signy & Mino: Against All Gods
description: Signy & Mino: Against All Gods is a new kind of combo RPG where you and your pup piece together flashy combos to dismantle a plethora of enemies! Discover your hidden powers as you find yourself hurtled into a conflict amongst the gods.

name: Dawntown
description:
All you can do is survive with all your might against the mysterious monster.
Feel the invisible fear and close survival in Dawntown.

name: The Greater
description:
Greater, which finds large numbers and quickly touches them and explodes them, is a casual game good for brain activity for the brain.
Try waking your brain in the morning and calming it down in the evening with a brief play.
Look at the collection of circles that appear and pop them in order from the largest.
Time keeps decreasing. But if you pop a circle, you get more time.

name: Basic Biking
description:
Physics-based pedaling!

Alternately push the buttons to pedal the bike, one button for each leg. Try to reach the goal without falling down.

name: Skyblock Chaos
description: A skyblock sandbox crafting and building adventure

name: My Adaptation In(to) Human
description: It's a visual novel horror game that's published on Steam.

name: Make It Stop!
description: A 3D shooter that places the player in the cockpit of a ship traveling through the bloodstream, fighting off viruses.

name: Perfect Performer: The Yellow Monkey
description: Perfect Performer: The Yellow Monkey is a Music/Rhythm video game featuring The Yellow Monkey, a Japanese Rock Band, formed by Kazuya Yoshii aka Lovin (Vocals), Hirose Youichi aka Heesey (Bass), Hideaki Kikuchi aka Emma (Guitar), Eiji Kikuchi aka Annie (Drums).

name: Club Penguin Avalanche
description: Club Penguin Avalanche is an unofficial revival of the beloved Club Penguin made by fans, specifically crafted for and by Brazilian players. Featuring a dedicated launcher, this nostalgic virtual world offers a unique and immersive experience reminiscent of the original game. Players can waddle around as penguins, explore various places, and participate in fun activities and minigames, just like in the old Club Penguin.

name: Mugengikyou: First Disaster
description:
A Touhou Project doujin bullet-hell action RPG with Reimu as the protagonist.

The game is split into two parts, action and battle.
If you run into enemies or traps during the action stage, you'll start the battle portion.

name: The Dark Room
description:
Puzzle your way out of this hi-tech Pandora's Box, and into the illustrious
"Dark Room Hall of Fame"!

name: Leaf's Odyssey
description: Leaf's Odyssey is a turn-based game where you fight various monsters in order to solve each puzzle. Every move can be predicted and anticipated. Failure is not punished; you can undo and try a different approach as many times as you want.

name: QS Monkey Land: King of Fruits
description:
Merge cute fruits to create bigger ones!
Who can create the giant fruit first?
Challenge now!

name: Mugengikyou: Second Departure
description: Mugengikyou: Second Departure is an Touhou fangame and one of the Mugengikyou series.

name: Math for the Real World
description: The player manages a rock band and must secure funds to producing music videos and become successful by managing the budget efficiently. This is achieved by completing objectives like keeping on schedule and ensuring the van does not run out of fuel.

name: Kebab Simulator
description: Cook kebab in comfort of your home

name: Sacred Earth: Reverie
description: A Point and Click RPG with Visual Novel elements, inspired by JRPG classics. Explore dungeons, build your characters, and battle foes in fast paced turn-based combat as you journey with your allies to discover the lost history of the past.

name: GeoGrid
description:
GeoGrid is a daily trivia game made to put your geography knowledge to the test!

Guess a country for each box in the board that matches the criteria specified by the box's row and column categories. Each box on any given board has anywhere from 5 to 30 unique answers. A new game board is generated each day at 12am EST.

Players have 10 guesses to fill out the grid, but can enable infinite mode for unlimited.
A country can only be guessed once per game board.

name: Hyakusen no Jou ni Kawatareshi Toki
description: Hyakusen no Jou ni Kawataresi Toki is a Japanese RPG, released by Eushry on PC in 2024.

name: Man Sa Yarbah Al Malyoon
description: Man Sa Yarbah Al Malyoon is a browser based game based on the show Man Sa Yarbah Al Malyoon, which is the Arabic version of Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?.

name: Archipelago
description: Shipwrecked and alone, you find yourself on a surreal reef strewn with mysterious items and bizarre devices.

name: Omega Nugget
description: Touch your screen to control Omega Nugget, only by steering left or right while automatically running forwards. Try to shoot down all the cars standing in your way and collect boosters to increase fire rate, fire power, health and other stats to help you complete each stage,

name: Electro Game Collection
description: Electro Game Collection is a series of LCD handheld games found in Japanese Gacha Machines. The game comes in 5 different colour variants.

name: Rooster
description: A Game Boy / Browser game based on "Rooster" by Alice in Chains.

name: I Saw A Strange Little Man
description: A mostly non-video exploration game where you discover the story of a fantasy world from characters, discover secrets, and ultimately search for a bottle.

name: Snootz Math Trek
description: An educational game where you work your way through various activities and games.

name: The Last Dimension
description:
You find a key to change your dimension. The infinite curiosity of mankind drives you to a decision: to reach the last dimension.
Do not touch the fractals or stay in the black void to reach higher dimensions! Each level has its own endless fractals, so what are you waiting for?
Please make sure not to reveal any personal information in the weekly leaderboard.
Warning: The Last Dimension's colorful effects may cause epilepsy.

name: FaithEater
description: In a world where humans hunt the Gods for a chance at hope, you have betrayed the Faith Eaters. Given the highest punishment, you've been thrown into the Cathedral at the End of the World, where the God of Death Muerte has been imprisoned. You expect it to devour you without mercy. Instead, it offers you hope. The very same hope the Faith Eaters have taken away.

name: Favor
description: Sin descripción

name: Happiness Inc.
description: Inspired by Shark Tank, this short romcom visual novel lets you present yourself and answer your prospect client's questions to convince him to marry you. Good luck, and show off your flirting skills in a business manner.

name: Teatime with a Vampire
description: Teatime with a Vampire is a semi-horror semi-surreal interactive story made in Twine. It was made for the Queer Vampire Jam and Smoochie Jam.

name: Social Democracy: An Alternate History
description: Play as the Social Democratic Party of Germany in 1928, and try to stop the NSDAP from taking power. Guide the party through elections and parliamentary politics, and deal with the Great Depression and the spiraling political violence that characterized the late "Weimar Republic".

name: The Knight Dance
description:
Gather 'round, young and old.
Listen as I regale you with the tale of two lovers: one as sure as the other is stubborn.
Dancing shoes, a few stolen hours each night, and an important decision to be made.
Does love truly conquer...or is love never enough?

name: Werewolf Party
description: Test your deception skills in this thrilling first-person multiplayer game. Play with 4-11 people, taking on diverse roles—from a cunning werewolf to an observant villager, each equipped with unique powers. Pay attention to detail, listen for vocal cues, and use your perception to win.

name: Sonic 2011
description: Sin descripción

name: Memorize the Cards
description:
Play a game of Memory against increasingly accurate opponents.

Match cards, and attempt to become the best Memory witch.

name: Death in Unison
description: Survive the world's deadliest psychopaths. Experience a unique 2-player co-op experience that puts your teamwork and communication to the test. Complete your duties alone or with a partner in a prison like no other.

name: Super Live Stadium
description: Super Live Stadium is a baseball game developed by Squaresoft in 1998. The game features a funny sense of humour (like when your character is out, etc), and some game modes like championship, and different vs modes (against another human player or against the computer), all of them with good graphics and different times of the day (day or night).

name: Power Stakes
description: Power Stakes is the first game in the horse simulation game series by Tose Software, in the game the player can only go through different stats of horses, places & jockeys. the game is heavy on japanese text, so only people that can fully understand japanese will like this game. There is no gameplay at all, since the player can only choose to view different races from different camera angles.

name: Power Stakes 2
description: Power Stakes 2 is the third (and last) game in Tose Software game series featuring the new data of the new season over the previous game. The game again features the 3d engine to watch the race in different camera angles that the player select in the game main menu. As new features the game now features the pedigree data and other things.

name: Final Fantasy III + Final Fantasy IV: Double Pack Edition
description:
Two of the most representative titles of the classic role-playing game series, brought together to get lost in their timeless stories of heroes, betrayal, love and redemption... now on PC.

Final Fantasy III

The game includes new and improved story sequences and 3D graphics, trading cards and Steam achievements, as well as new designs for Master's Diplomas. When darkness falls over the world and the light disappears, four young people are chosen by the crystals to embark on an adventure and save the world.

Final Fantasy IV

As the first game in the series to introduce the innovative continuous-time battle system, this classic title marked a milestone in Final Fantasy history. The game tells the story of Cecil, a dark knight who seeks redemption and ends up at the center of a battle that will decide the fate of the world.

name: Final Fantasy X/X-2 Ultimate Box
description: Final Fantasy X/X-2 Ultimate Box is a three-case boxset of the Ultimate Hits versions of Final Fantasy X and Final Fantasy X-2, and Final Fantasy X: Eternal Calm, released on the PlayStation 2 in Japan.

name: Solarys The Witch of Fire
description: Take control of the witch, Solarys, and fight your way through beat-'em-up styled levels, using kicks, punches, and fire magic.

name: Zoop
description: Sin descripción

name: Hugo: De Første Tegn
description: Sin descripción

name: Zoop
description: Sin descripción

name: La Quête du Dentiste
description: A French RPG

name: 1 4 the $
description: 1 4 the $ ("One For the Money") was written in three days as an entry to the SeedComp! 2024 sprouting round. It tells a story of consumption. It is intended for mature audiences.

name: Businessmen
description:
a group of businessman just arrived in delfino square, and they want to make sure they own all the coins around here.

traditional laws of physics don't apply for business.

name: Final Frog
description: Final Frog is a platform game in which a cute frog traverses levels to collect treasures (and flies)!

name: Kaetram
description: Adventure through a large world, unlock secret areas, complete quests, and collaborate with others to defeat bosses and become the best!

name: Sinij Parovoz
description:
Help the funny and cheerful steam train to get to the other side.
You have 10 attempts to guide the steam train through all the obstacles.
Move and click different objects.
Hurry up, time is limited.
Do not pay attention to the error message.

name: Jurassic Tower Defense
description: Welcome to Jurassic Tower Defense! Command your defenses and fend off waves of dinosaurs in this thrilling tower defense game. Strategically build turrets and manage resources to protect your base. Are you ready to rewrite history and bring about the extinction of the dinosaurs?

name: Koshachʼya Lyubovʼ
description:
A small cool quest.
Help the cat to get to the kitty.

name: The Batchelor
description: Sin descripción

name: Conventional Vampires
description: Sin descripción

name: Our Winding Road
description: Sin descripción

name: Curse of the Juniper Tree
description: Sin descripción

name: Swiped! Double Shots of Love
description:
"Swiped!: Double Shots of Love" is a romantic visual novel featuring a slightly older cast of 4 main love interests. You can customise your MC's name and pronouns.

This game features cussing, I'd usually recommend for a slightly older audience due to the cast of dateables.

name: Casual Desktop Game
description: Casual Desktop Game is a fanmade revival of the old Desktop Destroyer game featuring community content. Relieve stress by smashing your desktop or unleashing war. Create mods and share them with the community.

name: The Northern Passage
description: The Northern Passage is a (work in progress) horror fantasy CYOA, where you play as a hunter sent up north to investigate a series of missing people along the border of your home country and in the port cities of the Blackwater.

name: Tamagotchi
description: A Tamagotchi made specifically for mobile phones, resembling the first model ever released but now with original animations and an option to add color.

name: My Diamond Baby
description:
It is a long-established “escape game” that has gained popularity due to its difficulty level and the perfection of its endings.

It has been played more than 6 million times in total.

The objective of the game is for players to find items, make full use of them, solve the riddle, and escape from a closed room.

The basic controls are click-only (keyboard is used to input some passwords), and the game is suitable for players of all ages and genders.

In addition to Japanese, the game is also available in Korean and English.

name: Temple of Shadows
description:
Embark on an epic adventure as Sabastian Harrington, a passionate archeology grad student turned explorer, in search of his missing professor. Six weeks ago, Dr. Albert J. Montgomery III announced the discovery of a hidden temple, but he never returned. Now, Sabastian must dive into ancient temple ruins, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover hidden secrets. Will you reveal the mysteries within the Temple of Shadows?

Navigate the enigmatic Temple Ruins and unlock the secrets of the Temple Gate. Venture into the labyrinthine caves beyond, a realm filled with ancient mysteries and hidden dangers. Your mission: uncover the truth and track down the elusive Dr. Montgomery. Embark on this thrilling adventure and face challenges that will test your courage and wits at every turn. Can you reveal the secrets that lie within?

name: Cell of Empireo: RTC - Interlude
description: An interlude between Cell of Empireo: Isoi Sanemitsu no Records and Cell of Mirage.

name: Somnium Tenebris
description: Somnium Tenebris is a 5-player, investigative horror game set in a Lovecraftian world. Explore the depths of the ocean with your team as you uncover evidence in your efforts to identify the megalithic creature... and escape before it's too late.

name: Skin & Scales
description: Sin descripción
